section.title: TMPro.AssetConversionData Class Reference

para.para: Data structure containing a list of target and replacement fileID and GUID requiring remapping from previous versions of TextMesh Pro to the new TextMesh Pro UPM package. This data structure is populated with the data contained in the PackageConversionData.json file included in the package.
